statements: SELECT * FROM digital_art_competitions;
SELECT competition_name, submission_deadline FROM digital_art_competitions;
SELECT * FROM digital_art_competitions WHERE winner_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT competition_id, competition_name FROM digital_art_competitions ORDER BY submission_deadline DESC;
SELECT competition_name, COUNT(*) as num_submissions FROM digital_art_competitions GROUP BY competition_name;
SELECT * FROM digital_art_competitions WHERE competition_id = 'c756bdd9-66f0-4b39-b947-5937e2248753';
SELECT competition_name, submission_deadline FROM digital_art_competitions WHERE submission_deadline > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT competition_name, judging_criteria FROM digital_art_competitions WHERE winner_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM digital_art_competitions ORDER BY submission_deadline DESC;
SELECT competition_id, competition_name, winner_id FROM digital_art_competitions WHERE winner_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title FROM submissions WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT submission_id, artist_name, submission_date FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT artwork_title, artist_name, submission_date FROM submissions WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT criteria_description, max_score FROM judging_criteria ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title FROM submissions WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT submission_id, artist_name FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_submissions FROM submissions GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE submission_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT artwork_title, artwork_description FROM submissions WHERE submission_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_id, artwork_title, artwork_description FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT submission_id, artwork_title, artwork_description, submission_date FROM submissions WHERE artist_id = '<artist_id>';
SELECT winner_id, prize FROM winners WHERE winning_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY winning_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE artist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT artwork_title, submission_date FROM submissions WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY submission_date;
SELECT MAX(max_points) AS highest_points FROM judging_criteria;
SELECT submissions.*, winners.prize FROM submissions INNER JOIN winners ON submissions.submission_id = winners.submission_id;
SELECT artist_id, COUNT(*) AS submission_count FROM submissions GROUP BY artist_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name FROM submissions WHERE submission_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT submission_id, artwork_name, artist_name FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM judging_criteria WHERE criteria_name LIKE 'creativity%';
SELECT judge_name, speciality FROM judges WHERE speciality = 'painting';
SELECT * FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name FROM submissions WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT criteria_name FROM judging_criteria WHERE LENGTH(criteria_description) > 50
SELECT submission_id, artwork_name, submission_date FROM submissions WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT judge_name, speciality FROM judges
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT submission_title, artist_name FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT submission_id, submission_title FROM submissions WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM submissions_judges JOIN judges ON submissions_judges.judge_id = judges.judge_id;
SELECT s.submission_title, j.judge_name FROM submissions s JOIN submissions_judges sj ON s.submission_id = sj.submission_id JOIN judges j ON sj.judge_id = j.judge_id ORDER BY s.submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT submission_title, artist_name FROM submissions WHERE submission_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT judge_name, judge_email FROM judges ORDER BY judge_name DESC;

SELECT submissions.submission_title, judges.judge_name FROM submissions JOIN submissions_judges ON submissions.submission_id = submissions_judges.submission_id JOIN judges ON submissions_judges.judge_id = judges.judge_id;
SELECT winner_date, submission_title FROM winners JOIN submissions ON winners.submission_id = submissions.submission_id WHERE winner_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
